    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>

          <identifier>

            <entry>bioo_es_20070518_2_0030917</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="es">Absorción</string>
            <string language="en">Absorption</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Absorption</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Absorption</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Absorption</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Assorbimento</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Απορρόφηση</string>
          </title>
          <language>es</language>
          <description>
            <string language="es">Describe la absorción y explica diversas estructuras intestinales que la favorecen. También trata sobre el proceso de egestión y sus modalidades.</string>
            <string language="en">Topic describing absorption and explaining different intestinal structures which favour it. It also deals with the process of egestion and the different modalities.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">Absorción</string>
            <string language="en">Absorption</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">biosfera</string>
            <string language="en">biosphere</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">biología</string>
            <string language="en">Biology</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">Reino Animal</string>
            <string language="en">Animal kingdom</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <value>collection</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Thema, das Absorption beschreibt und 
unterschiedliche intestinale Strukturen erklärt, die sie bevorzugen. 
Sie beschäftigt auch den Prozeß von egestion und von 
unterschiedlichen Modalitäten.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Sujet décrivant l'absorption et expliquant les 
différentes structures intestinales qui la favorisent. Elle 
traite également le processus de l'egestion et des différentes 
modalités.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Tópico que descreve o absorption e que explica as
estruturas intestinal diferentes que o favorecem. Trata também 
do processo do egestion e dos modalities diferentes.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Soggetto che descrive assorbimento e che spiega le
strutture intestinali differenti che lo favoriscono. Egualmente 
si occupa del processo del egestion e delle modalità differenti.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Θέμα που περιγράφει την απορρόφηση και που εξηγεί τις 
διαφορετικές εντερικές δομές που το ευνοούν. Εξετάζει 
επίσης τη διαδικασία του egestion και των διαφορετικών μορφών.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Absorption</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Biosphäre</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Biologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
